attributes.action: Create Apprenticeships for adults in Scotland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am a 25 year old fit,healthy,keen and extremely capable individual like many others who are searching for a trade apprenticeship to better their life,family,prospects and country but due to the dispicable discrimination of my age like others I am unable to fulfill my dream.Lets STOP this UNFAIR discrimination and provide our GREAT country with more HOMEGROWN SKILLED WORKERS! sign up and let us be heard!
